General.Name: S. P. Apparels Limited
General.Description: S.P. Apparels Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of knitted garments for infants and children in India. It also offers yarns and fabrics. The company offers its products under the Angel & Rocket, HEAD, and Natalia brands. In addition, it engages in retail sale of menswear garments the Crocodile brand. The company also exports its products. S.P. Apparels Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Tirupur, India.

5.Name: Ms. P. V. Jeeva
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Garment Division
